name: The Discovery (PolyHedron Arts)
description:
The Discovery 

When a mysterious  alien object appears near Jupiter . It emits a signal that activates dormant temples that were placed throughout the solar system. Humanity sets out on mission to explore these temples and the trials that each temple has. Star Men  are sent out to  explore these temples. You Play as one of these star men sent to investigate a temple on Titan one of Saturn's moons What will You discover
